name: ArrayRecord Conversion
description: Converts a GCS objects(text, images) to ArrayRecord format.

parameters.name: input_path
parameters.label: Input destination
parameters.helpText: The path and filename prefix for reading input files. Example: gs://your-bucket/your-path

parameters.name: input_format
parameters.label: Input format
parameters.helpText: The format of the input files. Supported formats: text, images

parameters.name: output_path
parameters.label: Output destination
parameters.helpText: The path and filename prefix for writing output files. Example: gs://your-bucket/your-path
